alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Morgan County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 20 at 2:02PM MDT until August 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR METRO DENVER, EASTERN DOUGLAS, WESTERN ELBERT, MORGAN AND SOUTHERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 240, 241, 244 and 247. * Timing...through 8 PM MDT this evening. * Winds...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid fire spread. Avoid outdoor burning and any activity that may produce a spark and start a wildfire.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Morgan County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
